fields.body:
[{"type": "text", "value": "

Zygomatic implants offer a specialized solution for patients with severe bone loss in the upper jaw, allowing implant placement even when conventional implants are not feasible. Their unique anchoring into the zygoma (cheekbone) provides a stable foundation, ideal for cases requiring advanced restoration.

What Are Zygomatic Implants?

Zygomatic implants are longer than traditional dental implants, designed to anchor into the cheekbone rather than the upper jawbone, which is often diminished in patients who have experienced significant bone loss. This makes them ideal for individuals who would otherwise require bone grafting.

Key Benefits of Zygomatic Implants

Elimination of Bone Grafting: Provides a graft-free solution for severe maxillary atrophy.

Stability and Durability: Anchoring in dense zygomatic bone ensures long-lasting results.

Reduced Treatment Time: Minimizes the steps involved, often leading to faster recovery and fewer surgical interventions.

Clinical Applications and Use Cases

Zygomatic implants are primarily recommended for:

Severe Maxillary Bone Loss: Ideal for patients with minimal bone density or those who have undergone significant tooth loss over time.

Immediate Load Implants: The robust nature of zygomatic implants often supports immediate loading, allowing for temporary prosthetics soon after surgery.

Full-Arch Restorations: Zygomatic implants are particularly beneficial for patients requiring full arch replacements without the possibility of traditional implants.

", "id": "1dd153df-ee25-4506-86a8-7fc2edb60298"}, {"type": "text", "value": "

Leading Manufacturers

Global manufacturers specializing in high-quality zygomatic implants include:

Nobel Biocare: Known for its innovative zygomatic implant designs, Nobel Biocare offers implants that cater to both standard and complex cases with precision-engineered products.

Straumann: Provides comprehensive solutions in dental implantology, including zygomatic implants designed to work seamlessly with their prosthetics line.

Southern Implants: Focuses on advanced implant solutions for challenging cases, featuring a robust line of zygomatic implants that offer versatility and strength.

Procedure Overview

The procedure for zygomatic implants involves the following steps:

Initial Assessment and Imaging: Detailed 3D imaging to assess bone structure and plan implant placement.

Surgical Implantation: Placement of the implants into the zygomatic bone using minimally invasive techniques.

Prosthetic Loading: Either immediate or delayed, depending on the patient\u2019s bone quality and individual case specifics.

Aftercare and Longevity

To ensure the longevity of zygomatic implants, patients should adhere to:

Regular check-ups with a dental professional.

Comprehensive oral hygiene practices.

Avoiding habits like smoking, which may affect healing and integration.

In general ..

Zygomatic implants represent an advanced solution for complex dental cases, especially for patients with substantial upper jaw bone loss. With products from reputable manufacturers, they provide a reliable, minimally invasive option that eliminates the need for bone grafting. If you\u2019re considering zygomatic implants, consult with a qualified dental professional to evaluate your specific needs and treatment options.

Expert Advice for Choosing Zygomatic Implants

Consult a Specialist: Zygomatic implants are more complex than traditional implants, so it\u2019s essential to consult a skilled specialist, preferably an oral surgeon with experience in advanced implantology.

Review Case Studies: Ask to see before-and-after photos or case studies from previous patients. This can help you visualize potential outcomes and understand the specialist's experience level with similar cases.

Verify Materials and Certifications: Ensure that the implants used are from reputable manufacturers like Nobel Biocare, Straumann, or Southern Implants. Look for materials with CE or FDA certifications, which indicate quality and safety compliance.

Understand the Follow-Up Care Plan: Post-surgery care is critical for the success of zygomatic implants. Discuss the follow-up care plan in detail, especially if you\u2019re traveling internationally for the procedure. Some clinics offer teleconsultations, making it easier to maintain contact with your specialist after returning home.

Ask About Minimally Invasive Options: With advances in dental technology, many clinics now offer minimally invasive techniques, which can result in quicker recovery times and less discomfort. Inquire about the methods and technology used, such as 3D imaging for precise implant placement and CAD/CAM for custom prosthetics.

Consider Long-Term Maintenance: Zygomatic implants, when cared for properly, can provide durable, long-term support. Make sure to discuss maintenance requirements and any recommended practices for maximizing the lifespan of your implants, such as regular dental check-ups and specialized cleaning methods.

Expertise of Turkish Doctors in Zygomatic Implants

Turkey has gained a global reputation for high-quality dental care, particularly in advanced implantology. Turkish dentists and oral surgeons undergo rigorous training and are often certified by both local and international dental organizations, ensuring they maintain the highest standards in patient care and surgical precision.

Specialized Training and Certifications: Turkish oral surgeons specializing in zygomatic implants typically receive specialized training in maxillofacial surgery and implantology. Many hold international certifications, such as the American Board of Oral Implantology (ABOI) or memberships in the European Association for Osseointegration (EAO), which demonstrate their dedication to ongoing education and excellence.

Experience in Complex Cases: Due to Turkey's position as a hub for medical tourism, Turkish dentists frequently handle complex cases involving severe bone loss. This extensive experience makes them highly skilled in zygomatic implant placements, often achieving successful outcomes where traditional implants aren\u2019t viable.

Use of Cutting-Edge Technology: Turkish clinics are known for investing in advanced dental technology, including 3D imaging, digital scanners, and CAD/CAM systems. These technologies allow for highly accurate planning and minimally invasive techniques, which improve the precision and success rate of zygomatic implant procedures.

Cost-Effective and High-Quality Care: Turkish clinics offer competitive pricing for zygomatic implants, often significantly more affordable than Western countries. Despite the lower costs, the quality of care remains exceptional, with Turkish dentists frequently trained and certified by prestigious institutions.

Dedicated Services for International Patients: Turkish clinics provide comprehensive services for international patients, including assistance with travel, accommodation, and post-surgery follow-up. Many clinics also offer teleconsultation options, allowing patients to stay connected with their surgeons for ongoing support and check-ups after returning home.

With their extensive training, experience, and commitment to quality, Turkish doctors provide reliable and effective solutions for patients needing zygomatic implants, making Turkey a top destination for this specialized procedure.

", "id": "3fc1f962-8df4-499c-b863-1ead9a279683"}, {"type": "image_gallery", "value": {"settings": {"custom_template": "", "custom_css_class": "", "custom_id": ""}, "collection": 6}, "id": "c7a5dc4e-af56-48ba-8ac0-84e3f8c29b3a"}]

[{"type": "text", "value": "

Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery

Uzm. Dt. Faruk Feyyaz Da\u015ftan is a skilled and dedicated specialist in Oral, Dental, and Maxillofacial Surgery, committed to providing high-quality dental and oral health services. With years of education, training, and hands-on experience, he offers comprehensive care in a range of advanced dental procedures, including complex oral surgeries.

", "id": "f95e887c-e5d4-4d14-9197-4ea2c570569a"}, {"type": "image", "value": {"settings": {"custom_template": "", "custom_css_class": "", "custom_id": ""}, "image": 88}, "id": "1d7ebb57-34e8-40e9-954e-ac6d2e71d4ad"}, {"type": "html", "value": "
", "id": "a7db9ba9-5306-451a-8526-f8df48d52ea9"}, {"type": "button", "value": {"settings": {"custom_template": "", "custom_css_class": "", "custom_id": "", "ga_tracking_event_category": "", "ga_tracking_event_label": ""}, "page_link": 52, "doc_link": null, "other_link": "", "button_title": "", "button_style": "btn-dark", "button_size": ""}, "id": "05c166c7-38ff-48a4-90fc-1f15321248aa"}, {"type": "text", "value": "

.

.

Professional Background and Education

Born in 1992 in Bursa, Uzm. Dt. Faruk Feyyaz Da\u015ftan completed his early education in his hometown before embarking on a journey to become a specialist in dental health. His academic background includes:

  • Dental Degree: Graduated in 2015 from the Ankara University Faculty of Dentistry, a prestigious institution known for its strong academic and clinical training programs.
  • Specialization in Oral, Dental, and Maxillofacial Surgery: Achieved in 2020 at the Sel\u00e7uk University Faculty of Dentistry, Department of Oral, Dental, and Maxillofacial Surgery. This specialized training equipped him with the advanced skills needed to handle complex cases in oral and maxillofacial surgery.

Areas of Expertise

As an expert in Oral, Dental, and Maxillofacial Surgery, Uzm. Dt. Faruk Feyyaz Da\u015ftan is proficient in a range of surgical and non-surgical procedures, including but not limited to:

  • Dental Implants: Specializes in complex implant placements, including cases requiring advanced techniques for patients with limited bone density.
  • Oral Surgery: Conducts procedures such as wisdom tooth extractions, bone grafting, and sinus lifts with precision, ensuring minimal discomfort and fast recovery times for patients.
  • Maxillofacial Surgery: Skilled in corrective jaw surgeries and other reconstructive procedures that address facial irregularities and trauma, helping patients regain function and aesthetics.

Current Practice

Uzm. Dt. Da\u015ftan is currently practicing at \u00d6zel \u00dcmran T\u0131p Merkezi, where he provides patient-centered care tailored to individual needs. Known for his meticulous approach and compassionate manner, he prioritizes patient comfort and ensures that each patient feels informed and supported throughout their treatment journey.

Language Proficiency and Patient Communication

Languages: Fluent in Turkish and English, enabling him to communicate effectively with both local and international patients. This language proficiency ensures clear and accessible consultations, especially valuable for international patients seeking high-quality dental care in Turkey.

Why Choose Uzm. Dt. Faruk Feyyaz Da\u015ftan?

  1. Extensive Education and Specialization: Uzm. Dt. Da\u015ftan has a strong educational foundation with specialized training in Oral, Dental, and Maxillofacial Surgery, ensuring he is well-equipped to handle complex cases.
  2. Commitment to Advanced Care: With a focus on advanced techniques and patient-centered care, he uses the latest dental technology to deliver precise, effective treatments.
  3. Patient-Centered Approach: Known for his compassionate and understanding nature, he builds trust with patients by ensuring they feel informed and supported every step of the way.
  4. Internationally Recognized Standards: Practicing in Turkey, a renowned hub for medical tourism, Uzm. Dt. Da\u015ftan meets the high standards expected by both local and international patients, making him a reliable choice for those seeking expert care in oral and maxillofacial surgery.

Contact Information

For consultations or further information, you can contact Uzm. Dt. Faruk Feyyaz Da\u015ftan at \u00d6zel \u00dcmran T\u0131p Merkezi.

  • Email: info@umrantip.com
  • Specialization: Oral, Dental, and Maxillofacial Surgery
  • Practice Location: \u00d6zel \u00dcmran T\u0131p Merkezi
", "id": "7deb56ad-a17e-4257-b069-a8aaed20c225"}, {"type": "image_gallery", "value": {"settings": {"custom_template": "", "custom_css_class": "", "custom_id": ""}, "collection": 6}, "id": "cd2e3386-af7e-4dfe-bb4d-5d6dbf000bf3"}]

fields.body:
[{"type": "text", "value": "

Zigomatik implantlar, \u00fcst \u00e7enede ciddi kemik kayb\u0131 olan hastalar i\u00e7in \u00f6zel bir \u00e7\u00f6z\u00fcm sunar ve geleneksel implantlar\u0131n m\u00fcmk\u00fcn olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 durumlarda bile implant yerle\u015ftirilmesine izin verir. Zigoma (elmac\u0131k kemi\u011fi) i\u00e7ine benzersiz bir \u015fekilde sabitlenmeleri, geli\u015fmi\u015f restorasyon gerektiren vakalar i\u00e7in ideal olan sa\u011flam bir temel sa\u011flar.

Zigomatik \u0130mplantlar Nedir?

Zigomatik implantlar, geleneksel di\u015f implantlar\u0131ndan daha uzundur, \u00fcst \u00e7ene kemi\u011fi yerine elmac\u0131k kemi\u011fine tutunmak \u00fczere tasarlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r ve bu, \u00f6nemli kemik kayb\u0131 ya\u015fayan hastalarda genellikle azal\u0131r. Bu, onlar\u0131 aksi takdirde kemik grefti gerektiren ki\u015filer i\u00e7in ideal k\u0131lar.

Zigomatik \u0130mplantlar\u0131n Temel Faydalar\u0131

Kemik Greftinin Ortadan Kald\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131: \u015eiddetli maksiller atrofi i\u00e7in greft i\u00e7ermeyen bir \u00e7\u00f6z\u00fcm sa\u011flar.

Stabilite ve Dayan\u0131kl\u0131l\u0131k: Yo\u011fun elmac\u0131k kemi\u011fine ankraj, uzun s\u00fcreli sonu\u00e7lar sa\u011flar.

Azalt\u0131lm\u0131\u015f Tedavi S\u00fcresi: \u0130lgili ad\u0131mlar\u0131 en aza indirir, genellikle daha h\u0131zl\u0131 iyile\u015fmeye ve daha az cerrahi m\u00fcdahaleye yol a\u00e7ar.

Klinik Uygulamalar ve Kullan\u0131m \u00d6rnekleri

Elmac\u0131k implantlar\u0131 \u00f6ncelikle a\u015fa\u011f\u0131dakiler i\u00e7in \u00f6nerilir:

\u015eiddetli Maksiller Kemik Kayb\u0131: Minimal kemik yo\u011funlu\u011funa sahip hastalar veya zamanla \u00f6nemli di\u015f kayb\u0131 ge\u00e7irmi\u015f hastalar i\u00e7in idealdir.

\u0130mmediat Y\u00fck \u0130mplantlar\u0131: Zigomatik implantlar\u0131n sa\u011flam do\u011fas\u0131 genellikle immediat y\u00fcklemeyi destekler ve ameliyattan hemen sonra ge\u00e7ici protezlere izin verir.

Tam \u00c7ene Restorasyonlar\u0131: Zigomatik implantlar, geleneksel implantlar\u0131n olas\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131 olmadan tam \u00e7ene replasman\u0131 gerektiren hastalar i\u00e7in \u00f6zellikle faydal\u0131d\u0131r.

", "id": "1dd153df-ee25-4506-86a8-7fc2edb60298"}, {"type": "text", "value": "

Lider \u00dcreticiler

Y\u00fcksek kaliteli zigomatik implantlar konusunda uzmanla\u015fm\u0131\u015f k\u00fcresel \u00fcreticiler \u015funlar\u0131 i\u00e7erir:

Nobel Biocare: Yenilik\u00e7i zigomatik implant tasar\u0131mlar\u0131yla tan\u0131nan Nobel Biocare, hassas m\u00fchendislik \u00fcr\u00fcnleri ile hem standart hem de karma\u015f\u0131k vakalara hitap eden implantlar sunmaktad\u0131r.

Straumann: Protez serisiyle sorunsuz bir \u015fekilde \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmak \u00fczere tasarlanm\u0131\u015f elmac\u0131k implantlar\u0131 da dahil olmak \u00fczere dental implantolojide kapsaml\u0131 \u00e7\u00f6z\u00fcmler sunar.

Southern Implants: \u00c7ok y\u00f6nl\u00fcl\u00fck ve g\u00fc\u00e7 sunan sa\u011flam bir zigomatik implant serisine sahip, zorlu vakalar i\u00e7in geli\u015fmi\u015f implant \u00e7\u00f6z\u00fcmlerine odaklan\u0131r.

Prosed\u00fcre Genel Bak\u0131\u015f

Elmac\u0131k implantlar\u0131 i\u00e7in prosed\u00fcr a\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki ad\u0131mlar\u0131 i\u00e7erir:

\u0130lk De\u011ferlendirme ve G\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcleme: Kemik yap\u0131s\u0131n\u0131 de\u011ferlendirmek ve implant yerle\u015fimini planlamak i\u00e7in ayr\u0131nt\u0131l\u0131 3D g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcleme.

Cerrahi \u0130mplantasyon: Minimal invaziv teknikler kullan\u0131larak implantlar\u0131n elmac\u0131k kemi\u011fine yerle\u015ftirilmesi.

Protez Y\u00fckleme: Hastan\u0131n kemik kalitesine ve bireysel vaka \u00f6zelliklerine ba\u011fl\u0131 olarak hemen veya gecikmeli.

Bak\u0131m Sonras\u0131 ve Uzun \u00d6m\u00fcr

Zigomatik implantlar\u0131n uzun \u00f6m\u00fcrl\u00fc olmas\u0131n\u0131 sa\u011flamak i\u00e7in hastalar a\u015fa\u011f\u0131dakilere uymal\u0131d\u0131r:

Bir di\u015f hekimi ile d\u00fczenli kontroller.

Kapsaml\u0131 a\u011f\u0131z hijyeni uygulamalar\u0131.

\u0130yile\u015fmeyi ve b\u00fct\u00fcnle\u015fmeyi etkileyebilecek sigara i\u00e7mek gibi al\u0131\u015fkanl\u0131klardan ka\u00e7\u0131nmak.

Genelde..

Zigomatik implantlar, \u00f6zellikle \u00f6nemli \u00fcst \u00e7ene kemi\u011fi kayb\u0131 olan hastalar i\u00e7in karma\u015f\u0131k di\u015f vakalar\u0131 i\u00e7in geli\u015fmi\u015f bir \u00e7\u00f6z\u00fcm\u00fc temsil eder. Sayg\u0131n \u00fcreticilerin \u00fcr\u00fcnleriyle, kemik grefti ihtiyac\u0131n\u0131 ortadan kald\u0131ran g\u00fcvenilir, minimal invaziv bir se\u00e7enek sunarlar. Elmac\u0131k implantlar\u0131 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcyorsan\u0131z, \u00f6zel ihtiya\u00e7lar\u0131n\u0131z\u0131 ve tedavi se\u00e7eneklerinizi de\u011ferlendirmek i\u00e7in kalifiye bir di\u015f hekimine dan\u0131\u015f\u0131n.

Zigomatik \u0130mplant Se\u00e7imi i\u00e7in Uzman Tavsiyesi

Bir Uzmana Dan\u0131\u015f\u0131n: Zigomatik implantlar geleneksel implantlardan daha karma\u015f\u0131kt\u0131r, bu nedenle yetenekli bir uzmana, tercihen ileri implantoloji deneyimi olan bir a\u011f\u0131z cerrah\u0131na dan\u0131\u015fmak \u00f6nemlidir.

Vaka \u00c7al\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131n\u0131 \u0130nceleyin: \u00d6nceki hastalardan \u00f6ncesi ve sonras\u0131 foto\u011fraflar\u0131 veya vaka \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6rmek isteyin. Bu, olas\u0131 sonu\u00e7lar\u0131 g\u00f6rselle\u015ftirmenize ve uzman\u0131n benzer vakalarla ilgili deneyim d\u00fczeyini anlaman\u0131za yard\u0131mc\u0131 olabilir.

Malzemeleri ve Sertifikalar\u0131 Do\u011frulay\u0131n: Kullan\u0131lan implantlar\u0131n Nobel Biocare, Straumann veya Southern Implants gibi sayg\u0131n \u00fcreticilerden oldu\u011fundan emin olun. Kalite ve g\u00fcvenlik uyumlulu\u011funu g\u00f6steren CE veya FDA sertifikalar\u0131na sahip malzemeleri aray\u0131n.

Takip Bak\u0131m Plan\u0131n\u0131 Anlay\u0131n: Ameliyat sonras\u0131 bak\u0131m, elmac\u0131k implantlar\u0131n\u0131n ba\u015far\u0131s\u0131 i\u00e7in kritik \u00f6neme sahiptir. \u00d6zellikle prosed\u00fcr i\u00e7in uluslararas\u0131 seyahat ediyorsan\u0131z, takip bak\u0131m plan\u0131n\u0131 ayr\u0131nt\u0131l\u0131 olarak tart\u0131\u015f\u0131n. Baz\u0131 klinikler telekons\u00fcltasyonlar sunarak eve d\u00f6nd\u00fckten sonra uzman\u0131n\u0131zla ileti\u015fiminizi s\u00fcrd\u00fcrmenizi kolayla\u015ft\u0131r\u0131r.

Minimal \u0130nvaziv Se\u00e7enekler Hakk\u0131nda Sorun: Di\u015f teknolojisindeki geli\u015fmelerle birlikte, bir\u00e7ok klinik art\u0131k minimal invaziv teknikler sunmakta ve bu da daha h\u0131zl\u0131 iyile\u015fme s\u00fcreleri ve daha az rahats\u0131zl\u0131kla sonu\u00e7lanabilmektedir. Hassas implant yerle\u015fimi i\u00e7in 3D g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcleme ve \u00f6zel protezler i\u00e7in CAD/CAM gibi kullan\u0131lan y\u00f6ntemler ve teknolojiler hakk\u0131nda bilgi al\u0131n.

Uzun S\u00fcreli Bak\u0131m\u0131 D\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcn: Zigomatik implantlar, uygun \u015fekilde bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda dayan\u0131kl\u0131, uzun vadeli destek sa\u011flayabilir. \u0130mplantlar\u0131n\u0131z\u0131n \u00f6mr\u00fcn\u00fc en \u00fcst d\u00fczeye \u00e7\u0131karmak i\u00e7in bak\u0131m gereksinimlerini ve d\u00fczenli di\u015f kontrolleri ve \u00f6zel temizleme y\u00f6ntemleri gibi \u00f6nerilen uygulamalar\u0131 tart\u0131\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131zdan emin olun.

T\u00fcrk Doktorlar\u0131n Zigomatik \u0130mplant Uzmanl\u0131\u011f\u0131

T\u00fcrkiye, \u00f6zellikle ileri implantolojide y\u00fcksek kaliteli di\u015f bak\u0131m\u0131 konusunda k\u00fcresel bir \u00fcn kazanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. T\u00fcrk di\u015f hekimleri ve a\u011f\u0131z cerrahlar\u0131 s\u0131k\u0131 bir e\u011fitimden ge\u00e7erler ve genellikle hem yerel hem de uluslararas\u0131 di\u015fhekimli\u011fi kurulu\u015flar\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan sertifikaland\u0131r\u0131l\u0131rlar, bu da hasta bak\u0131m\u0131 ve cerrahi hassasiyette en y\u00fcksek standartlar\u0131 korumalar\u0131n\u0131 sa\u011flar.

Uzmanl\u0131k E\u011fitimi ve Sertifikalar: Elmac\u0131k implantlar\u0131 konusunda uzmanla\u015fm\u0131\u015f T\u00fcrk a\u011f\u0131z cerrahlar\u0131 tipik olarak \u00e7ene cerrahisi ve implantoloji alan\u0131nda uzmanl\u0131k e\u011fitimi al\u0131rlar. Bir\u00e7o\u011fu, Amerikan Oral \u0130mplantoloji Kurulu (ABOI) veya Avrupa Osseoentegrasyon Derne\u011fi (EAO) \u00fcyelikleri gibi uluslararas\u0131 sertifikalara sahiptir ve bu da s\u00fcrekli e\u011fitim ve m\u00fckemmelli\u011fe olan ba\u011fl\u0131l\u0131klar\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6sterir.

Karma\u015f\u0131k Vakalarda Deneyim: T\u00fcrkiye'nin medikal turizm i\u00e7in bir merkez olmas\u0131 nedeniyle, T\u00fcrk di\u015f hekimleri s\u0131kl\u0131kla ciddi kemik kayb\u0131 i\u00e7eren karma\u015f\u0131k vakalar\u0131 ele almaktad\u0131r. Bu kapsaml\u0131 deneyim, onlar\u0131 elmac\u0131k implant\u0131 yerle\u015ftirmelerinde son derece yetenekli k\u0131lar ve genellikle geleneksel implantlar\u0131n uygun olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 durumlarda ba\u015far\u0131l\u0131 sonu\u00e7lar elde eder.

En Son Teknolojinin Kullan\u0131m\u0131: T\u00fcrk klinikleri, 3D g\u00f6r\u00fcnt\u00fcleme, dijital taray\u0131c\u0131lar ve CAD/CAM sistemleri dahil olmak \u00fczere geli\u015fmi\u015f di\u015f teknolojisine yat\u0131r\u0131m yapmalar\u0131yla tan\u0131nmaktad\u0131r. Bu teknolojiler, zigomatik implant prosed\u00fcrlerinin hassasiyetini ve ba\u015far\u0131 oran\u0131n\u0131 art\u0131ran son derece hassas planlamaya ve minimal invaziv tekniklere izin verir.

Uygun Maliyetli ve Y\u00fcksek Kaliteli Bak\u0131m: T\u00fcrk klinikleri, elmac\u0131k implantlar\u0131 i\u00e7in genellikle Bat\u0131 \u00fclkelerinden \u00f6nemli \u00f6l\u00e7\u00fcde daha uygun fiyatl\u0131 rekabet\u00e7i fiyatlar sunmaktad\u0131r. D\u00fc\u015f\u00fck maliyetlere ra\u011fmen, T\u00fcrk di\u015f hekimlerinin prestijli kurumlar taraf\u0131ndan s\u0131k s\u0131k e\u011fitilmesi ve sertifikaland\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131 ile bak\u0131m kalitesi ola\u011fan\u00fcst\u00fc olmaya devam etmektedir.

Uluslararas\u0131 Hastalar i\u00e7in \u00d6zel Hizmetler: T\u00fcrk klinikleri, uluslararas\u0131 hastalar i\u00e7in seyahat, konaklama ve ameliyat sonras\u0131 takip dahil olmak \u00fczere kapsaml\u0131 hizmetler sunmaktad\u0131r. Bir\u00e7ok klinik, hastalar\u0131n eve d\u00f6nd\u00fckten sonra s\u00fcrekli destek ve kontroller i\u00e7in cerrahlar\u0131yla ba\u011flant\u0131da kalmalar\u0131na olanak tan\u0131yan telekons\u00fcltasyon se\u00e7enekleri de sunar.

Kapsaml\u0131 e\u011fitimleri, deneyimleri ve kaliteye olan ba\u011fl\u0131l\u0131klar\u0131 ile T\u00fcrk doktorlar, elmac\u0131k implantlar\u0131na ihtiya\u00e7 duyan hastalar i\u00e7in g\u00fcvenilir ve etkili \u00e7\u00f6z\u00fcmler sunarak T\u00fcrkiye'yi bu \u00f6zel prosed\u00fcr i\u00e7in en iyi yer haline getiriyor.

[{"type": "text", "value": "

A\u011f\u0131z, Di\u015f ve \u00c7ene Cerrahisi

\u00d6\u011fr. Dt. Faruk Feyyaz Da\u015ftan, A\u011f\u0131z, Di\u015f ve \u00c7ene Cerrahisi alan\u0131nda yetenekli ve kendini i\u015fine adam\u0131\u015f bir uzmand\u0131r ve y\u00fcksek kaliteli di\u015f ve a\u011f\u0131z sa\u011fl\u0131\u011f\u0131 hizmetleri sunmaya kendini adam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Y\u0131llar\u0131n e\u011fitimi, \u00f6\u011fretimi ve uygulamal\u0131 deneyimiyle, karma\u015f\u0131k a\u011f\u0131z ameliyatlar\u0131 da dahil olmak \u00fczere bir dizi geli\u015fmi\u015f di\u015f prosed\u00fcr\u00fcnde kapsaml\u0131 bak\u0131m sunar.

", "id": "f95e887c-e5d4-4d14-9197-4ea2c570569a"}, {"type": "image", "value": {"settings": {"custom_template": "", "custom_css_class": "", "custom_id": ""}, "image": 88}, "id": "1d7ebb57-34e8-40e9-954e-ac6d2e71d4ad"}, {"type": "html", "value": "
", "id": "a7db9ba9-5306-451a-8526-f8df48d52ea9"}, {"type": "button", "value": {"settings": {"custom_template": "", "custom_css_class": "", "custom_id": "", "ga_tracking_event_category": "", "ga_tracking_event_label": ""}, "page_link": 52, "doc_link": null, "other_link": "", "button_title": "", "button_style": "btn-dark", "button_size": ""}, "id": "05c166c7-38ff-48a4-90fc-1f15321248aa"}, {"type": "text", "value": "

.

.

Mesleki Ge\u00e7mi\u015f ve E\u011fitim

1992 y\u0131l\u0131nda Bursa'n\u0131n Uzm il\u00e7esinde do\u011fdu. Dt. Faruk Feyyaz Da\u015ftan, di\u015f sa\u011fl\u0131\u011f\u0131 uzman\u0131 olmak i\u00e7in bir yolculu\u011fa \u00e7\u0131kmadan \u00f6nce ilk e\u011fitimini memleketinde tamamlad\u0131. Akademik ge\u00e7mi\u015fi \u015funlar\u0131 i\u00e7erir:

  • Di\u015f Hekimli\u011fi Diplomas\u0131: G\u00fc\u00e7l\u00fc akademik ve klinik e\u011fitim programlar\u0131 ile tan\u0131nan prestijli bir kurum olan Ankara \u00dcniversitesi Di\u015f Hekimli\u011fi Fak\u00fcltesi'nden 2015 y\u0131l\u0131nda mezun oldu.
  • A\u011f\u0131z, Di\u015f ve \u00c7ene Cerrahisinde Uzmanl\u0131k: 2020 y\u0131l\u0131nda Sel\u00e7uk \u00dcniversitesi Di\u015f Hekimli\u011fi Fak\u00fcltesi A\u011f\u0131z, Di\u015f ve \u00c7ene Cerrahisi Anabilim Dal\u0131'nda ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirildi. Bu uzmanl\u0131k e\u011fitimi, onu oral ve maksillofasiyal cerrahide karma\u015f\u0131k vakalar\u0131 ele almak i\u00e7in gereken ileri becerilerle donatt\u0131.

Uzmanl\u0131k Alanlar\u0131

A\u011f\u0131z, Di\u015f ve \u00c7ene Cerrahisi uzman\u0131 olan Uzm. Dt. Faruk Feyyaz Da\u015ftan, a\u015fa\u011f\u0131dakiler dahil ancak bunlarla s\u0131n\u0131rl\u0131 olmamak \u00fczere bir dizi cerrahi ve cerrahi olmayan prosed\u00fcrde uzmand\u0131r:

  • Dental \u0130mplantlar: S\u0131n\u0131rl\u0131 kemik yo\u011funlu\u011funa sahip hastalar i\u00e7in ileri teknikler gerektiren durumlar da dahil olmak \u00fczere karma\u015f\u0131k implant yerle\u015ftirmelerinde uzmanla\u015fm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.
  • A\u011f\u0131z Cerrahisi: Yirmilik di\u015f \u00e7ekimleri, kemik grefti ve sin\u00fcs kald\u0131rma gibi prosed\u00fcrleri hassasiyetle uygulayarak hastalar i\u00e7in minimum rahats\u0131zl\u0131k ve h\u0131zl\u0131 iyile\u015fme s\u00fcreleri sa\u011flar.
  • Maksillofasiyal Cerrahi: Y\u00fcz d\u00fczensizliklerini ve travmay\u0131 ele alan d\u00fczeltici \u00e7ene ameliyatlar\u0131 ve di\u011fer rekonstr\u00fcktif prosed\u00fcrlerde yetenekli, hastalar\u0131n fonksiyon ve esteti\u011fi yeniden kazanmalar\u0131na yard\u0131mc\u0131 olur.

G\u00fcncel Uygulama

\u00d6\u011fr. Dt. Da\u015ftan \u015fu anda \u00d6zel \u00dcmran T\u0131p Merkezi'nde \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmakta ve burada bireysel ihtiya\u00e7lara g\u00f6re uyarlanm\u0131\u015f hasta merkezli bak\u0131m sunmaktad\u0131r. Titiz yakla\u015f\u0131m\u0131 ve \u015fefkatli tavr\u0131 ile tan\u0131nan, hasta konforunu \u00f6n planda tutar ve her hastan\u0131n tedavi yolculu\u011fu boyunca bilgilendirilmi\u015f ve desteklenmi\u015f hissetmesini sa\u011flar.

Dil Yeterlili\u011fi ve Hasta \u0130leti\u015fimi

Diller: T\u00fcrk\u00e7e ve \u0130ngilizce'yi ak\u0131c\u0131 bir \u015fekilde konu\u015farak hem yerel hem de uluslararas\u0131 hastalarla etkili bir \u015fekilde ileti\u015fim kurmas\u0131n\u0131 sa\u011flar. Bu dil yeterlili\u011fi, \u00f6zellikle T\u00fcrkiye'de y\u00fcksek kaliteli di\u015f bak\u0131m\u0131 arayan uluslararas\u0131 hastalar i\u00e7in de\u011ferli olan a\u00e7\u0131k ve eri\u015filebilir kons\u00fcltasyonlar sa\u011flar.

Why Choose Uzm. Dt. Faruk Feyyaz Da\u015ftan?

  1. Kapsaml\u0131 E\u011fitim ve Uzmanl\u0131k: Uzm. Dt. Da\u015ftan, A\u011f\u0131z, Di\u015f ve \u00c7ene Cerrahisi alan\u0131nda uzmanl\u0131k e\u011fitimi alm\u0131\u015f g\u00fc\u00e7l\u00fc bir e\u011fitim temeline sahiptir ve karma\u015f\u0131k vakalar\u0131 ele almak i\u00e7in iyi donan\u0131ml\u0131 olmas\u0131n\u0131 sa\u011flar.
  2. Geli\u015fmi\u015f Bak\u0131ma Ba\u011fl\u0131l\u0131k: Geli\u015fmi\u015f tekniklere ve hasta merkezli bak\u0131ma odaklanarak, hassas ve etkili tedaviler sunmak i\u00e7in en son di\u015f teknolojisini kullan\u0131r.
  3. Hasta Merkezli Yakla\u015f\u0131m: \u015eefkatli ve anlay\u0131\u015fl\u0131 do\u011fas\u0131yla tan\u0131nan, yolun her ad\u0131m\u0131nda bilgilendirilmi\u015f ve desteklenmi\u015f hissetmelerini sa\u011flayarak hastalarla g\u00fcven in\u015fa eder.
  4. Uluslararas\u0131 Kabul G\u00f6rm\u00fc\u015f Standartlar: Medikal turizm i\u00e7in tan\u0131nm\u0131\u015f bir merkez olan T\u00fcrkiye'de uygulamak, Uzm. Dt. Da\u015ftan, hem yerel hem de uluslararas\u0131 hastalar\u0131n bekledi\u011fi y\u00fcksek standartlar\u0131 kar\u015f\u0131lamakta ve bu da onu a\u011f\u0131z ve \u00e7ene cerrahisinde uzman bak\u0131m\u0131 arayanlar i\u00e7in g\u00fcvenilir bir se\u00e7im haline getirmektedir.

\u0130leti\u015fim Bilgileri

Dan\u0131\u015fma veya daha fazla bilgi i\u00e7in Uzm ile ileti\u015fime ge\u00e7ebilirsiniz. Dt. Faruk Feyyaz Da\u015ftan \u00d6zel \u00dcmran T\u0131p Merkezi'nde.

  • E-posta: info@umrantip.com
  • Uzmanl\u0131k: A\u011f\u0131z, Di\u015f ve \u00c7ene Cerrahisi
  • Practice Location: \u00d6zel \u00dcmran T\u0131p Merkezi
